Ayurveda is the most ancient stream of medical science and the natural herbs found in the deep areas of the Himalayas and other places possess a lot of medicinal properties. Our ancient gurus had discovered those properties after years of research and trials. Most of these herbal properties are listed in some ancient books.

If we follow these guidelines, we would be able to treat almost all the disease naturally. We believe that before starting the proper treatment for a patient regarding any disease or disorder, it is very important to examine his or her symptoms in an Ayurvedic way. For this purpose, we assign with you a dedicated health consultant who understands your problems and symptoms deeply. This involves a lot of questions and answers sessions between the counselor and the patient. We always encourage the patients to give the correct information regarding their health status for correct treatment.

The health status and treatment of a patient is not decided by a single consultant, rather a team of consultants start to look into the reports of the patient and then a unanimous decision is taken by the team regarding the course of the treatment. The treatment process is always initiated through the Ayurvedic System of Medicine. This involves prescribing approved herbal compositions, classical or proprietary tablets, ointments etc. This process is always different with people with different symptoms.

The uniqueness of our treatment process lies in the way our expert team develops the customized forms of medication combined with a customized diet plan and secret yoga tips. We believe that the effects and results of our ayurvedic medicine can be multiplied with the help of a proper healthy eating routine and daily workout in the form of yoga. But here we need to keep in mind that not all the diet plans or yoga tips work in every case. They depend and vary on the individual’s Prakriti and symptoms. For this, our experts are well trained to suggest you the best options.
